statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data
SELECT sensor_name, data_value FROM sensor_data WHERE data_value > 50 ORDER BY sensor_name ASC
SELECT sensor_name, data_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY data_value DESC
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM sensor_data
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, MAX(data_value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id, sensor_name
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY data_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_name, AVG(data_value) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING AVG(data_value) > 50
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensor_data WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY sensor_name ASC
SELECT data_value, sensor_name FROM sensor_data WHERE data_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31' ORDER BY data_value DESC
SELECT DISTINCT(sensor_name) FROM sensor_data
SELECT sensor_id, location, temperature, humidity FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT location, humidity, temperature FROM Sensors WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, temperature FROM Sensors WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT location, humidity FROM Sensors ORDER BY humidity ASC, location;
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT location, temperature FROM Sensors WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM Sensors WHERE location LIKE 'Room%' AND humidity > 60 ORDER BY location ASC, temperature DESC
SELECT s.location, sd.timestamp, sd.value FROM Sensors s JOIN SensorData sd ON s.sensor_id = sd.sensor_id WHERE sd.value > 100 ORDER BY sd.timestamp DESC

SELECT s.location, s.temperature, sd.timestamp, sd.value FROM Sensors s JOIN SensorData sd ON s.sensor_id = sd.sensor_id WHERE s.temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY s.location ASC, sd.timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM measurements GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT AVG(value) AS avg_value, timestamp FROM measurements GROUP BY timestamp ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE location='Room A' ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, value FROM sensors INNER JOIN measurements ON sensors.sensor_id = measurements.sensor_id WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, alert_text FROM sensors INNER JOIN alerts ON sensors.sensor_id = alerts.sensor_id WHERE is_acknowledged = FALSE;
SELECT sensor_name, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensors INNER JOIN measurements ON sensors.sensor_id = measurements.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name;
SELECT * FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM SensorLocation WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT sensor_id, model, manufacturer FROM SensorMetadata WHERE manufacturer = 'Company B';
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE value > 50 AND value < 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT alert_id, sensor_id, timestamp, message FROM SensorAlerts ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM SensorLocation WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, model, manufacturer FROM SensorMetadata WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, message FROM SensorAlerts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, value FROM SensorData WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensors
SELECT location, battery_level FROM sensors
SELECT * FROM measurements
SELECT measurement_id, sensor_id, measurement_type, value FROM measurements
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, battery_level FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Room A' ORDER BY sensor_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT device_name, vendor, location FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Temperature Sensor' ORDER BY device_name ASC
SELECT * FROM sensors INNER JOIN measurements ON sensors.sensor_id = measurements.sensor_id WHERE measurements.value > 50 ORDER BY measurements.timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, location FROM devices WHERE vendor = 'ABC Inc.' AND device_type IN ('Motion Sensor', 'Light Sensor') ORDER BY device_id
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, severity, timestamp FROM alerts WHERE severity = 'High' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
